★ Release Notes: 2022-11-16 ★
≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡

Thanks for upgrading to the latest version of the ALKS CLI!

* Adds support for providing an account alias instead of an account ID when generating keys

Have feedback? https://github.com/Cox-Automotive/ALKS-CLI/issues

☁☁☁☁☁☁  Happy Clouding! ☁☁☁☁☁☁
